text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-I was just imagining what 
would happen…… if my poster 
was put up.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
It would go unnoticed by anyone until 
the colors fade, develop weird smudges 
and smears～

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
And when it falls off…… it'll get 
stepped on and have footprints 
all over it～～!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
So there will be more trash because of
me… Please forgive me, I'm really sorry
～～!
